about_the_game:
Mod Shooter: the arena FPS where every the rules change every game! Inspired by the boomer shooters arena shooters of the past, as well as LAN parties with custom lobbies, Mod Shooter changes the rules of the game every round.

Party Game Meets Arena Shooter!


Across multiple maps and game modes, modifiers will fundamentally shape how you play each game of Mod Shooter. With different maps, modes, modifiers, and weapons, no two games will ever be the same.

Want more control? The host can also manually modify the game settings.

Features

  • 4 Game Modes
  • 4 Maps
  • 15 Modifiers
  • 3 Guns
  • Thousands of Unique Game Combinations!

Please note that there is currently no public matchmaking, and only private invite-only lobbies are supported. Public lobbies and matchmaking may possibly be added in a future update, depending on interest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080Ti / RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
